commit_scope: Add explicit Codex/OpenClaw functional readiness contract to agent integration API and tests
evidence_refs:
cd api && /opt/homebrew/bin/python3.11 -c "import asyncio; from httpx import ASGITransport, AsyncClient; from app.main import app; async def _r():
  async with AsyncClient(transport=ASGITransport(app=app), base_url='http://test') as c:
    r = await c.get('/api/agent/integration'); d = r.json(); print(r.status_code, d.get('status'), d.get('provider_readiness',{}).get('overall_ready'), d.get('provider_readiness',{}).get('missing_required'));
asyncio.run(_r())"

e2e_validation.expected_behavior_delta: GET /api/agent/integration now returns explicit provider_readiness for codex/openclaw with overall_ready and missing_required contracts.
